text:
@narendramodi @MagufuliJP Any help done to family who cost thier family member  due to covid 19 ????? 
Nothing !!!! Not even asked !!!!! 
We r on 4 no in covid19 race !!!! 
Do help middle and poor people !!! 
Otherwise nation will die .......
Nor electricity bill nor any rent relief !!!!!!! 🙏🙏🙏🙏🙏🙏🙏 https://t.co/pgUZVBkCfr
